reviews.review: i hate it. cause it's stressful. shirtless david is a plus.

The game overall is fun but its got really big flaws. Perk balance is very bad at times with survivors having extremely op perks and killers having extremely op perks. At the end of the day though it is a fun game and i do recommend it.
haven't played that much yet but it's pretty fun.
lots of fun with and without friends.

Be me.
Be on a gen.
Have paranoia the likes of which has never been seen.
Run perks to alert you when the Killer is near.
Instantly jump into a locker the moment Spine Chill goes off.
Never get caught in the same locker and finish said gen.

Sums up my skill.
Игра нормас! Можно вместе с друзьями посидеть вечерком часик или два
Nice game, but when you get triggered, take a break. (trust me, it's for your own good)
Muito legal jogar com os amigos!!!

Entweder man mag es oder nicht. Es gibt immer wieder neue bugs die aber meist schnell behoben werden. Und wenn man das Game nicht ernst nimmt kann man gut Spaß haben solange der Killer nett ist und einen nicht tunnelt, sluggt oder becampt (Franzosen aus Cod lassen grüßen^^).

Oferece uma modalidade de gameplay versátil e cativante e, mesmo que o bugs tenha seu jogo; jogo tenha seus bugs; a behavior mantem-se ativa com a comunidade e com as atualizações do game. Recomendo que compre o jogo e suas DLCs quando entrarem em offering.

Dead by Daylight. Вообще я не особо любитель онлайн игр, но посмотрев пару роликов об игре и купив ее я понял, что сделал это не зря. Классные ( и иногда знакомые) маньяки. Интересные выжившие. Хорошо проработанные локации. Ну и самое главное, это крики друзей когда играешь за маньяка)
Buen juego para pasar el rato solo o con amigos, si no te toca un killer campero o tunelero.
Игра крутая, но лучше играть в пати)

Really hate this game, but I am addicted.

Really wish the devs would listen to us, and fix their goddamn game.

Owned this game for a while now and have almost hit 700 hours played.
Gameplay can be as simple or as complex as you like (in general), and there are lots of ways to succeed at your chosen role.
If you want to be successful, the best killer (The Nurse) is included in the base game and survivor perks can be earned with time; If you want to have fun, there are four other killers to choose from and plenty more characters to purchase.
Developers seem to genuinely care about player satisfaction and the regular updates/bug fixes are great.
Would recommend to anyone who enjoys multiplayer games with friends or by themselves.
You'll love this game, play the heck out of it until you burn yourself out, grow to hate it; yet always come back for more.
Muy buen juego, tiene limitadas opciones de configuracion lo que no me gusta tanto pero lo demas es un excelente juego para pasar horas de diversion

Пару раз зашёл в игру, так чисто, убить не много времени. ИГРУ НЕ СОВЕТУЮ, куча токсиков, кемперов и прочих П*даросов, с большой буквы, а также значения слов которых вы можете узнать только вступив это дэбильное комунити, купить можно, деньги я так понимаю разработчики любят, но играть не советую, хочу устроить некий бунд для разрабов, пока игру не починят. И это не у меня кампухтер гавно, а игра просто так вылетает с крашем посреди мансов с маном. Если у вас есть друзья, что странно, это отличная игра, что бы после пары часов вы стали ярым интровертром и экставетом и подобными отбросами социального общества. Прощу прощения за грамотность. ХАРЧОК В ЛИЦО <пх-тьфу>...

Great potential but devs aren't listening to an extremely vocal community, many community figures have made hour long videos talking about how to balance all perks and to fix core issues with the game, the updates are played way too safe, which has left me not playing this game anymore, it's the same thing, over and over again, and when and update does come out, it's really just more bloat. So fuck it, don't buy this game, most of my hours were just me playing out of boredom.

Das Spiel ist mittlerweile nicht mehr Spielbar ich verstehe absolut nicht wie man ein Spiel Patch für Patch immer mehr kaputt machen kann. Solch unfähige Leute welche ein Game machen wie bei DBD habe ich in meinem Leben noch nicht gesehen.

Ich kann das Spiel absolut niemanden mehr Empfehlen
This game has terrible sales practices and no redeeming qualities
Meiner Meinung nach einer der besten action-horror Spiel meines Lebens , taktisch, mega viel spaß im Multiplayer würde ich jedem empfehlen!

FUDERAM O JOGO 
MAS O RESTO O JOGO É UMA DELICIA

This game is so good i literaly never sleep anymore like for real dude...you think cuz im scared....no cuz its fun : DDDDDDDD 
...............................wait did i eat something today????? oh shit
i just bought this game like a month ago, and it's super fun. totally recommend it!
Nice and spooky. the only downside is the high amount of DLC.

Баги, читеры, токсичное комьюнити, откровенный дисбаланс, на всё это я закрывал глаза. Но вот на, что не стоит закрывать глаза это на лицемерие разрабов, которые запретили покупку дополнений для РФ и РБ. Я против войны, как и любой адекватный человек, а игры и политика не должны пересекаться, но лицемерие разрабов лично мне запомнится надолго.
Игра хорошая, если её оптимизировать для слабых ПК
This game can be as fullfilling as it can be stressful at times. As a pvp game, it has that flaw, yet it is so addictive and entertaining that you can't quit it
I love playing and would honestly recommend
Loved DBD eversince I started playing, and it is a great game
great game. I think they did a pretty good job so far
I've had a lot of fun with this game. You get a leveling system with every character, you're able to get (and lose as you progress) items from the leveling system. 10/10 Would play again
Dont know which game is more toxic, this or Rust, but it's worth.

Un très bon jeu , je le recommande. 
Difficile dans les premières heures de jeu pour les survivants, en revanche maîtriser tous les tueurs demande plus de temps. Un système de rang quelques fois inégal. Le point négatif est la communauté des fois cancers de la part de certains tueurs. 
Dead by Daylight reste globalement très bon.

Muito bom o jogo, pode só melhorar a questão do ping por não ter server dedicado, mas no geral, é muito bom! Indico bastante jogar com amigos, fica beeeem mais divertido assim, além de facilitar na hora de sobreviver ao killer :)
Dead by daylight is an amazing game, though buggy and exploity at some times, it still brings constant enjoyment
Genuinely Enjoyable asymmetrical horror game, lots of content added regularly, with the ability to both earn characters/cosmetics or support the game by buying through the store.
good game. it still has some problems but hey it's great

If you're looking for a competitive gaming experience, this game is not for you. If you're looking to have fun doing dumb shit with friends, welcome to Dead by Daylight.

Update (11/27/19): This review still holds true.
I THINK WE DID A PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR

Despite the issues the game will run into through its time, keeping in mind the dev team not being super big like many others today and offering such a unique title I feel is what keeps me involved in both the game and the community.
es un juego divertido y entretenido para jugarlo con amigos
